name: market for landed anchovy, fresh | landed anchovy, fresh | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19129/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'landed anchovy, fresh', in the geography of Peru.;This dataset does not contain transportation as it is assumed that landed anchovy is pumped directly to the reduction plant. No losses are considered in this dataset.;The product 'landed anchovy, fresh' is a wild-caught fish landed whole at the port.

Landed anchovy is directly pumped from the fishing vessel to the plant.

The activity ends with the provision of anchovy.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data are intended to reflect current equipment and processes on a Global level.
